function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited understanding of proteins in wastewater","Impact":"Inability to accurately assess public health of communities","Mitigation":"Increase research and exploration of protein analysis methods in wastewater","Technologies":"Advanced analytical techniques for protein extraction and analysis","People":"Public health officials, researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of investigation into stability of proteins in sewage systems","Impact":"Risk of obtaining unreliable data from wastewater analysis","Mitigation":"Conduct research on the stability of proteins in sewage systems","Technologies":"Advanced analytical techniques for protein stability assessment","People":"Analytical chemists, environmental engineers","Owner":"Research institutions, environmental organizations"},{"Description":"Unmonitored antimicrobial usage within a community","Impact":"Potential misuse of antimicrobial medications and development of resistant bacteria","Mitigation":"Implement wastewater-based monitoring of antimicrobial usage","Technologies":"Wastewater-based drug monitoring systems","People":"Health authorities, wastewater treatment facilities","Owner":"Public health organizations, wastewater treatment facilities"}]}
